cursorMovement.title: Pergerakan Kursor

commands.W: lompat ke awal kata selanjutanya (kata-kata dapat mengandung tanda baca)
commands.E: lompat ke akhir kata selanjutnya (kata-kata dapat mengandung tanda baca)
commands.B: lompat ke awal kata sebelumnya (kata-kata dapat mengandung tanda baca)
commands.ge: jump backwards to the end of a word
commands.gE: jump backwards to the end of a word (words can contain punctuation)
commands.zero: lompat ke awal baris saat ini
commands.caret: lompat ke karakter pertama baris saat ini
commands.dollar: lompat ke akhir baris saat ini
commands.g_: jump to the last non-blank character of the line
commands.G: pindah ke baris paling akhir dokumen
commands.Fx: jump to previous occurence of character x
commands.Tx: jump to after previous occurence of character x
commands.semicolon: repeat previous f, t, F or T movement
commands.comma: repeat previous f, t, F or T movement, backwards
commands.closeCurlyBrace: Lompat ke paragraf berikutnya (atau blok kode, saat mengedit kode)
commands.openCurlyBrace: Lompat ke paragraf sebelumnya (atau blok kode, saat mengedit kode)
commands.CtrlPluse: move screen down one line (without moving cursor)
commands.CtrlPlusy: move screen up one line (without moving cursor)
commands.percent: move to matching character (default supported pairs: '()', '{}', '[]' - use :h matchpairs in vim for more info)
commands.tip: Awali perintah pergerakan kursor dengan angka untuk pengulangan. Misal, <kbd>4j</kbd> bergerak ke bawah 4 baris.

cursorMovement.tip: Prefix a cursor movement command with a number to repeat it. For example, <kbd>4j</kbd> moves down 4 lines.

commands.o: menambahkan (membuka) baris baru dibawah baris saat ini
commands.O: menambahkan (membuka) baris baru diatas baris saat ini
commands.ctrlPlush: delete the character before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusw: delete word before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusj: begin new line during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlust: indent (move right) line one shiftwidth during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusd: de-indent (move left) line one shiftwidth during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusn: insert (auto-complete) next match before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusp: insert (auto-complete) previous match before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusrx: insert the contents of register x

commands.J: menyambung baris di bawah dengan baris saat ini
commands.gJ: join line below to the current one without space in between
commands.gu: change to lowercase up to motion
commands.gU: change to uppercase up to motion
commands.cc: menghapus isi baris saat ini untuk diganti dengan text lain
commands.C: change (replace) to the end of the line
commands.cDollar: menghapus semua karakter setelah kursor hingga akhir baris
commands.cw: menghapus satu kata untuk diganti dengan kata lain
commands.S: menghapus isi baris saat ini untuk diganti dengan text lain (sama dengan cc)

markingText.title: Menandai Text (Visual Mode)

commands.v: memulai mode visual, menandai baris-baris, lalu jalankan perintah (misal y-yank)
commands.V: memulai mode visual secara per baris
commands.o: pindah ke ke bagian akhir dari area lain yang telah ditandai
commands.O: pindah ke sudut lain pada sebuah blok

markingText.tip1: Instead of <kbd>b</kbd> or <kbd>B</kbd> one can also use <kbd>(</kbd> or <kbd>{</kbd> respectively.

registers.title: Registers

commands.quotePlusy: yank into the system clipboard register
commands.quotePlusp: paste from the system clipboard register

registers.tip1: Registers are being stored in ~/.viminfo, and will be loaded again on next restart of vim.

tip2.title: Special registers:
tip2.quote: unnamed register, last delete or yank
tip2.minus: last small (less than a line) delete

marks.title: Marks

commands.currentPositionA: set current position for mark A
commands.jumpPositionA: jump to position of mark A
commands.yankToMarkA: yank text to position of mark A
commands.backtick0: go to the position where Vim was previously exited
commands.backtickQuote: go to the position when last editing this file
commands.backtickDot: go to the position of the last change in this file
commands.backtickBacktick: go to the position before the last jump
commands.ctrlPlusi: go to newer position in jump list
commands.ctrlPluso: go to older position in jump list
commands.gcomma: go to newer position in change list
commands.gsemicolon: go to older position in change list
commands.ctrlPlusCloseSquare: jump to the tag under cursor

marks.tip1: To jump to a mark you can either use a backtick (<kbd>`</kbd>) or an apostrophe (<kbd>'</kbd>). Using an apostrophe jumps to the beginning (first non-black) of the line holding the mark.

global.title: Global

commands.K: open man page for word under the cursor

global.tip1: Run <kbd>vimtutor</kbd> in a terminal to learn the first Vim commands.

commands.yaw: yank (copy) word under the cursor and the space after or before it
commands.yDollar: menyalin dari posisi sekarang hingga akhir baris saat ini
commands.p: menempelkan salinan dari clipboard setelah kursor
commands.P: menempelkan salinan dari clipboard sebelum kursor
commands.daw: delete (cut) word under the cursor and the space after or before it
commands.D: menghapus (memotong) hingga ke akhir baris saat ini
commands.dDollar: menghapus (memotong) hingga ke akhir baris saat ini

commands.greaterThanPercent: indent a block with () or {} (cursor on brace)
commands.=Percent: re-indent a block with () or {} (cursor on brace)
commands.closeSquarep: paste and adjust indent to current line

commands.colonw: menulis (menyimpan) ke file, tapi tidak keluar
commands.colonq: keluar (batal jika ada perubahan yang belum disimpan)
commands.colonqbang: keluar dan abaikan perubahan yang telah dibuat
commands.colonwqa: write (save) and quit on all tabs

commands.backslashVpattern: pola 'magic': karakter-karater non alfanumerik diinterpretaskan sebagai sebagai simbol regex khusus (tidak membutuhkan escape)
commands.colonPercentForwardSlashOldForwardSlashN: tukar yang lama dengan yang baru di keseluruhan file
tukar yang lama dengan yang baru di kesluruhan file dengan konfirmasi

commands.coloncopen: membuka windows baru yang menampilkan hasil temuan

commands.colone: mengedit file di dalam buffer baru
commands.colonbfile: go to a buffer by file
commands.colonsp: buka file di buffer baru dan split jendela
commands.colonvsp: buka file di buffer baru dan split jendela secara vertikal
commands.colonvertba: edit all buffers as vertical windows
commands.ctrlPluswx: exchange current window with next one
commands.ctrlPlusw=: make all windows equal height & width
commands.ctrlPluswh: memindahkan kursor ke jendela kiri (split vertikal)
commands.ctrlPluswl: memindahkan kursor ke jendela kanan (split vertikal)
commands.ctrlPluswj: memindahkan kursor ke jendela bawah (split horizontal)
commands.ctrlPluswk: mmemindahkan kursor ke jendela atas (split horizontal)

commands.ctrlPluswT: move the current split window into its own tab
commands.colontabmove: pindahkan tab saat ini ke urutan ke # (urutan mulai dari angka 0)
commands.colontabc: tutup tab saat ini dan semua jendela di dalamnya
commands.colontabo: tutup semua tab kecuali tab yang aktif saat ini
commands.colontabdo: menjalankan perintah command pada semua tab (misal: :tabdo q - akan menutup semua tab)

diff.title: Diff

commands.zf: manually define a fold up to motion
commands.zr: reduce (open) all folds by one level
commands.zm: fold more (close) all folds by one level
commands.closeSquarec: jump to start of next change
commands.openSquarec: jump to start of previous change
commands.colonDiffthis: make current window part of diff
commands.colonDiffoff: switch off diff mode for current window

diff.tip1: The commands for folding (e.g. <kbd>za</kbd>) operate on one level. To operate on all levels, use uppercase letters (e.g. <kbd>zA</kbd>).
diff.tip2: To view the differences of files, one can directly start Vim in diff mode by running <kbd>vimdiff</kbd> in a terminal. One can even set this as <kbd>git difftool</kbd>.
